snippet.title: The Power of Continuous Delivery
snippet.description:
The True Power of Continuous Delivery: Reducing Risk and Increasing Effectiveness | Martin Hinshelwood

While speed is a byproduct, the true benefits lie in consistency, reliability, and risk reduction through automation. Iâ€™ll share examples, including lessons from Knight Capital Group and CrowdStrike, to illustrate why continuous delivery is essential for modern software development.
